    • getInstance

      public static Server getInstance()
      Server Instance because it's singleton.
      Returns:
      it return the instance of the server.

    • main

      public static void main​(String[] args)
      Server Main method, with the serverPort as an argument.
      Parameters:
      args - the arguments that the server takes.

    • start

      public void start()
      Server start method, creates a server socket, and waits for the player, when a new player comes to the server, the server establish a new ClientHandler and starts the client as a thread.

    • sendMessage

      public void sendMessage​(JSONMessage jsonMessage, PrintWriter writer)
      This message is activated when a JSON Message is being sent.
      Parameters:
      jsonMessage - The JSON Message itself
      writer - The writer of the client who the message should be sent to.

    • areAllPlayersReady

      public boolean areAllPlayersReady()
      This method checks if a all the players in the lobby are ready.
      Returns:
      True if all are ready, if not it returns false.

    • getPlayerWithID

      public Player getPlayerWithID​(int ID)
      This method gets the Player of the sent ID.
      Parameters:
      ID - The ID of the player.
      Returns:
      the player if the ID is right, if not then null.

    • getConnectionWithID

      public ClientHandler.Connection getConnectionWithID​(int ID)
      This method gets the Connection of the sent ID.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the player if the ID is right, if not then null.

    • readyPlayerWithoutAI

      public ArrayList<Player> readyPlayerWithoutAI()
      This method save all the players in the game without the AI.
      Returns:
      the ArrayList.

    • onlyAI

      public boolean onlyAI()
      This method checks if only AIs are in the server.
      Returns:
      True if all players are AIs, otherwise false.
